fallbackToID: Use trans-unit ID attribute for the text unit name if there is no resname
ignoreInputSegmentation: Ignore segmentation information in the input
alwaysUseSegSource:
Always use the content of seg-source even if there are differences between
source
addTargetLanguage: Add target-language attribute if not present
overrideTargetLanguage: Override target language of XLIFF document
allowEmptyTargets: Allow empty <target> elements in XLIFF document
skipNoMrkSegSource: Skip seg-sources with no marked segments
outputSegmentationType0: Only segment if the input text unit is segmented
outputSegmentationType1: Always segment (even if the input text unit is not segmented)
outputSegmentationType2: Never segment (even if the input text unit is segmented)
outputSegmentationType3: Segment only if the entry is segmented, regardless of the input
factoryClass: Factory class for custom XML stream parser
useTranslationTargetState: Update the status attribute value of translated XLIFF document
alwaysAddTargets: Add <target> elements if XLIFF document is monolingual
forceUniqueIds: Rewrite TU IDs to ensure uniqueness when needed
iwsBlockLockStatus:
Set finished segments to lock_status="locked" attribute to
translate="no"
iwsBlockTmScore: Set segments with matching tm_score attribute value to translate="no"
iwsBlockTmScoreValue: Value of the tm_score to match
iwsIncludeMultipleExact:
Include segments with multiple_exact="has_multiple_exact" attribute
regardless of their tm_score
iwsBlockMultipleExact:
Set finished segments with multiple_exact="has_multiple_exact"
attribute to translate="no"
cdataSubfilter:
Process CDATA content with this subfilter
(e.g. “okf_html”; leave blank to disable)
pcdataSubfilter:
Process PCDATA content with this subfilter
(leave blank to disable)
